About Me

Hello!

With over ten years of experience in cybersecurity, I specialize in various technologies including NGFW, EDR/XDR, FIM, DLP, SWG, VPN, IVS/EVS, and IDS/IPS. My problem-solving skills have been key in addressing cybersecurity issues promptly, minimizing operational impact and enhancing efficiency. I am also proficient in the AWS cloud, extending my expertise to cloud security and infrastructure. My approach involves hands-on deployment and management of security measures, protecting organizations from cyber threats and ensuring regulatory compliance. I excel in collaborating with teams across the globe to strengthen cybersecurity defences. Committed to staying updated with technological and security trends, I focus on delivering robust cybersecurity solutions for dynamic environments.

In my free time, I enjoy tinkering with computers and swimming.

Feel free to contact me through LinkedIn or via email.
